text:
On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh
@AdamBaylissEA @Bob_of_Hills @EnvAgencyYNE @theoutdoorcity Great video. I'm a reporter at The Star newspaper. Would it be OK to share this video please and to speak to you about it? Thanks
@RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk #StopTheStink https://t.co/qklfE552iq
@LeeValleyPark @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia So what has happened to the flow? 25 years ago this was a fishable river.
@PublicHealthEng @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency #StopTheStink I will add eyes my eyes are so irritated rubbish on my chest too anxiety https://t.co/9kVrSatV3l
